title: Missing Skins
body:
So I used to have Unchained Ali and Rito Gurl Tristana.

I am wondering under what circumstances they were removed?

Gracias.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Were these skins gifted to you or did you obtain them as part of the promotion while they were free?

If the former is the case then it is possible the person who gifted you the skins has performed a chargeback, if the latter then you may wish to [contact Player Support ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)as this is more than likely an issue with your account.
